subject: Re: [junit] Re: J2ME Unit
msgSnippet: I downloaded from the XP site software page: http://www.xprogramming.com/software.htm Because J2ME doesn t have reflection, this framework used some tedious
messageBody:
I downloaded from the XP site software page:

http://www.xprogramming.com/software.htm

Because J2ME doesn't have reflection, this framework used some tedious trick
to run the tests. I wonder if there is an alternative.

Shane

Robert Sartin wrote:

> --- In junit@y..., Shane Duan <sduan@b...> wrote:
> > I wonder if anyone has used J2ME Unit and the opnion on it
>
> Haven't seen it. Where is it?
>
> Regards,
>
> Rob
